member.name: T:MainApp.My.MyWpfExtension
member.summary: Module used to define the properties that are available in the My Namespace for WPF

member.summary: Returns the application object for the running application

member.name: P:MainApp.My.MyWpfExtension.Computer
member.summary: Returns information about the host computer.

member.name: P:MainApp.My.MyWpfExtension.User
member.summary: Returns information for the current user. If you wish to run the application with the current Windows user credentials, call My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser().

member.name: P:MainApp.My.MyWpfExtension.Log
member.summary: Returns the application log. The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file.

member.name: P:MainApp.My.MyWpfExtension.Windows
member.summary: Returns the collection of Windows defined in the project.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MainApp.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MainApp.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:MainApp.FromBaseTenCommandModel.ConvertFromBaseTen(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts the number given in base ten to the target base
member.param: The target base. Should be from two to nine

member.name: M:MainApp.ToBaseTenCommandModel.ConvertToBaseTen(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts the number given as a digit string in the source base to base ten
member.param: The number to convert to base ten
The base the number is in. Should be from two to nine

member.name: M:MainApp.FiguresToWords.ConvertTwoDigits(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a two digit number to words
member.param: the two digit number as a string
member.returns: A string representing the figure as a word
